content: Adjusted EPS, a non-GAAP financial measure that excludes noncash expenses, preferred stock dividends, litigation expense and foreign currency translation totaled a gain of $0.02 per share as compared to a loss of $0.27 per share in the same year ago period. Adjusted EPS, a non-GAAP financial measure that excludes noncash expenses, preferred stock dividends, litigation expense and foreign currency translation totaled a loss of $0.47 per share as compared to a loss of $1.42 per share in the same year ago period.
